CustomField.description: Yes mean an accrual value will never be calculated but a balance will be maintained. This may be applicable to Leave Rules such as Unpaid Leave where there is never an accrual, grant or entitlement.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Yes mean an accrual value will never be calculated but a balance will be maintained. This may be applicable to Leave Rules such as Unpaid Leave where there is never an accrual, grant or entitlement.
CustomField.label: Balance Only and Never Accrues
